mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_no, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_role, mem_state, mem_date) values(mem_no_seq.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email}, 2, 1, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id = #{id} and mem_role=2 and mem_state=1
